# Lunarusuit
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Legendary
#Special-Item-Rarity/Legendary

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
This *[[Mycelosuits|mycelosuit]]* grants the wearer a 60- foot flying speed. These suits are made from [[Lunarae|moon child]] caps and stems ([[Lunarae|lunarae]]).
